posts.post_content:
The next Un-Set should establish Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar as a Planeswalker. Then his signature move can be:
  
   
Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar's Pneumonoultramicroscopicsilicovolcanoconiosis
  
   
and his familiar can be:
  
   
Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar's Supercalafragilisticexpialadocious Gargoyle
  
   
   
Also, for people who want a Mox, 'Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar' has the same number of syllables as 'Supercalafragilisticexpialadocious'. I discovered this trying to see how I could make saying the name easier.
  
   
 Forget Squab, I'LL give you a Mox if you re-write the Mary Poppins song with Magic lyrics and using his name and put it on YouTube. Granted I'm not rich- the best I can do is the FTV Mox Diamond. But still.
posts.html:
The next Un-Set should establish Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar as a Planeswalker. Then his signature move can be:

and his familiar can be:

Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar's Supercalafragilisticexpialadocious Gargoyle


Also, for people who want a Mox, 'Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar' has the same number of syllables as 'Supercalafragilisticexpialadocious'. I discovered this trying to see how I could make saying the name easier.

Forget Squab, I'LL give you a Mox if you re-write the Mary Poppins song with Magic lyrics and using his name and put it on YouTube. Granted I'm not rich- the best I can do is the FTV Mox Diamond. But still.

posts.post_content: Can't believe you guys only rated Granite Gargoyle 3/5. It's incredibly powerful & versatile for the cost. In the early days, probably red's best creature of all, at least until WotC started making all those annoying "haste" red creatures that are impossible to defend against. (Hey, I enjoyed Ball Lightning when it first came out, but when every creature attacks instantly, it gets pretty frustrating What are you gonna do, never attack so you can block your opponent's random haste-creatures?).
posts.html:
Can't believe you guys only rated Granite Gargoyle 3/5. It's incredibly powerful & versatile for the cost.
